titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at the consecration of a chappel in the house of John Collins, Esq., of Chute in Wiltshire, performed by the Right Reverend Father in in [sic] God Seth, Lord Bishop of Sarum, on the 25th of September, 1673 by Joseph Kelsey ...
titleStmt.author: Kelsey, Joseph, d. 1710.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Duke University Library.
